alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 04 at 10:47PM AKST until December 05 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ward Lake and Areas Near The Ward Lake Recreational Area. * WHEN...Until 315 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying near Ward Lake including trails and picnic areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1043 PM AKST, Satellite estimates indicated heavy rain across the advisory area earlier Monday afternoon. Gage data on Ward Creek from Mon morning showed that the creek was at bankfull. Since then, around 1.5 inches of rain fell in a few hours Monday afternoon and another 1 inch of rainfall is possible in the area through the next 24 hours. Minor flooding is expected to begin overnight near Ward Lake.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
